name: MetalEtemon
effect: [Opponent's Turn] For each Digimon card with [Etemon] in its name in your trash, this Digimon gets +1000 DP. [On Deletion] ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon. (Trash 1 card from the top of one of your opponent's Digimon. If it has no digivolution cards, or becomes a level 3 Digimon, you can't trash any more cards.)
